lex.tree: (SENTENCES (S (NP-OBJ (TAG AGENT-1)) (VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=passive,person=non-3rd,number=plural] (VB base) (PP (IN in) (NP-SUBJ (NP (DT[form=defined] the) (NN city)) (PP (IN of) (NP (TAG PATIENT-1)))))) (. .)))
